item.description:
Come join us for another night of live music at Johnny Ds! This time we'll be hearing two bands – The Love Dogs (R&B and Swing) at 7:30 and The Peacheaters (Allman Brothers cover band) at 10:00. (Please note, there are separate cover charges.)

http://www.johnnyds.com/music-calendar/

When you RSVP, please indicate which show(s) you are coming to, and also if you want to have dinner during the early show. (The dinner reservation would be at 7:00.)

We look forward to a fun night of listening and dancing to great music!

Towards the end of the week, once I have an idea of the numbers, I will confirm dinner arrangements and also a meeting place.

Karen
item.name: Love Dogs and Peacheaters at Johnny Ds!
